articles.title: Sony Is Killing the PS5 Launch Feature Everyone Forgot About - IGN Daily Fix - IGN
articles.description: In today’s Daily Fix, Sony will be retiring PS5's Accolades feature later this year, as players have not used the awards-based system as much as the company anticipated when it was unveiled at launch.
